basics.name: Daniel Leibold
basics.label: Tech Lead & Product Engineer
basics.summary: I'm an enthusiastic and product focused engineer with a strong sense for teamplay. I like TDD and ATDD to favour outcome over output. I'm generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

education.institution: The University of Applied Sciences in Osnabrück

certificates.name: Certified Project Specialist according to IPMA 3.0

publications.name: Testing with VS2012. 'From Dogma to Karma'.
publications.summary: Writing an article about TDD with my former colleague Christoph Molenda.

work.summary: Developer and Manager in a cross-functional and empowered product team (9 people) that provides platform products as self-services for developers (IDP) to reduce cognitive load. Developer experience (DevEx) Lead. Leading, building and maintaining user trainings and documentation on our platform based on GitLab, Terraform and Kubernetes (500 users). Improve operational efficency with automation on Python, Kubernetes and Terraform.
work.name: PricewaterhouseCoopers GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft
highlights: Development and Maintaining of central Self-Service UI based on Python Flask by integrating our monitoring stack (Prometheus, Loki, Grafana) and our CI/CD pipeline in GitLab
Design and Build new Container Services based on Kubernetes and Azure in context of global enterprise
Engaging developers to share knowledge as Community Call Ambassador (60+ recordings of knowledge)
Deputy Product Owner, stand-in Scrum Master for the Team and Deputy Security Champion
Tech Stack: Kubernetes, Terraform, Azure, GitLab Ultimate, Hashicorp Vault, OPA, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Visual Studio Code, Python, Bash

work.summary: Azure DevOps Automation Engineer in an agile product team (7 people). Facilitator of agile practices and principles through servant leadership.
work.name: PwC IT Services GmbH
highlights: Role Model for Product Development (be the first of everything)
Development of WebApplications & Services (Azure WebApp, Azure MS SQL) with Visual Studio and C# .NET
Deployment of services on Azure PaaS with ARM Templates & CI/CD on Azure DevOps

work.summary: Senior consultant, architect and developer in the field of portals and collaboration for the integration of Microsoft technologies into corporate enterprises.
work.name: ConVista Consulting AG

work.summary: Architect and developer in the field of Microsoft technologies.

work.summary: .NET Developer and consultant. Development of various SharePoint portal solutions for internal business processes and workflows.
